Name: Molecoole
About the game: Molecoole is an action shooter roguelike, where you get upgrades by attaching different atoms to your character! Gameplay: Move through randomly generated levels and build an ever growing Molecoole. Every atom you find in your playthrough is different. You can make better and better combinations as you collect more atoms. Key features: 70+ different atoms you get randomly through the game 5+ boss levels 4+ biomes that are procedurally generated Tons of combinatons of upgrades
